titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 1319) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 5.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 1319) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 5.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-11, by Mr. McGovern.
The resolution provides for the motion that the House concur in the Senate amendment to H.R. 1319.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 198.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 206 (Roll no. 65).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 210 (Roll no. 66).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 1319 (American Rescue Plan Act of 2021).
